headline: His Speech Filled Hearts (and Stomachs) in Ohio
abstract: The L.S.U. quarterback’s comments after winning the Heisman Trophy resonated with a region that struggles with poverty.
lead_paragraph: THE PLAINS, Ohio — Athens High School is perched atop a hill. As the hill slopes toward flat lands to the west, a terraced parking lot and a tidy football stadium have been carved out. At the bottom are trailer homes stacked side by side.
